messages.message: You are now connected on Messenger.
Hello, very glad to be your friend, hope you write back. Regards

Brian
Wow that is extremely polite. Thank you for reaching out!
From Uganda

Brian
You are my first friend from Uganda. What is it like there?
Good but difficult

Brian
What is difficult?
How can I help?

I lost my elder sister last year, she was kidnapped and murdered because a debt she owed some people. It has really dragged me down thinking about her and missing her presence in my life, she was my life. I work with elementary pupils, I teach critical thinking, humanism, sports and social studies, I like working with pupils/youth. I manage a sports academy and a freethinkers club, I do road works/running with pupils aiming at uplifting their concetration in school but resources to perform the best are limited.

Brian
That is terrible.  I am sorry.
I also enjoy working in education.
Hi friend!

Brian
Hey I saw your post the other day.
fine but boring

Brian
Yeah, I've been job hunting.
you got?

Brian
Not yet, had an interview at a medical office, they might respond today could be next month.
okay, I still want to work with pupils here though its small pay but I get too much exposure with them, I have learnt from them a lot.

Brian
That's really noble work, children are the future.

Brian
I have an interview at mindspree.com this afternoon
MindSpree
“My son Andrew is dyslexic and struggles with reading. We were worried he was going to have to repeat the grade. But we found an exceptional tutor who worked one-on-one with Andrew to help him become a much stronger reader. Thanks MindSpree!”
mindspree.com

Brian
How are you doing?

Hello, how are you? I'm fair, I'm requesting kindly for your efforts, enclosed is a gofundme page that has been set by a friend, kindly asking for your support/donations. Thank you https://­www.gofundme.com/­help-masereka-get-a-m­otorbike
hello friend, I got my bike. the fundraiser was okay 100% funding

Brian
Nice!
